price: ការបញ្ចុះគម្ពីរ(គួរអាន)គឺមកពីម្ចាស់គ្រប់គ្រងពិភពទាំង អស់ដោយគ្មានការសង្ស័យក្នុងវាឡើយ។
arabic: تَنزِيلُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ لَا رَيۡبَ فِيهِ مِن رَّبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: tanzīlu al-kitābi lā rayba fīhi min rabbi al-ʿālamīna
